description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Hyper-V elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-38080):

1. Download and apply the KB5040442 or KB5040431 update for your respective Windows 11 version from the official Windows Update catalog.
2. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update resolves the elevation of privilege issue that arises from an integer overflow or wraparound vulnerability, which could allow an attacker with low privileges to exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated permissions.
- For manual installation, download the update packages from:
  - [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
  - [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running the affected versions of Windows 11 (23H2, 22H2, or 21H2).
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
